newsitem.title: Argentina: RESEARCH ALERT - Moody's rates Perez Companc B1.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Moody's rates Perez Companc B1.

text.p: - Moody's Investors Services said Monday it has assigned a B1 rating to Argentina's industrial holding Perez Companc SA .

- Moody's said the rating, which affects about $1.0 billion of debt securities of Perez Companc's senior unsecured obligations is based on the firm's anticipated growth "as a result of growing demand in all of its business segments and of the key role it plays in Argentina's continued economic development."
- The rating agency said the rating is constrained by Argentina's B1 sovereign ceiling.
- Moody's said it expects that "Perez Companc will continue to benefit from growth in all of its business segments," including oil and gas, electricity and telecommunications.
